ThingDef.label: primitive component
ThingDef.description: Lots of wood pieces used to create more complex items.

ThingDef.label: Simple component
ThingDef.description: Lots of wood and metal parts that can be used to create more complex objects.

ThingDef.label: Simple mechanism
ThingDef.description: Lots of wood and metal parts that can be used to create more complex objects.

ThingDef.label: Complex mechanism
ThingDef.description: A set of metal gears of various shapes and sizes, with which you can assemble complex mechanical products.

ThingDef.label: Book
ThingDef.description: By itself is not of interest, but the knowledge that you can sharpen inside...

ThingDef.label: Simple repair kit
ThingDef.description: A kit for repairing minor damage to equipment and clothing.

ThingDef.label: industrial biosolids
ThingDef.description: Advanced fertilizer from waste, plant and animal remains.

ThingDef.Name: UncutGem
ThingDef.description: An uncut and highly desirable stone for profit seekers.

ThingDef.label: healer kit
ThingDef.description: A healer's kit to provide emergency care to the wounded. The set includes herbs, bandages and charms.

ThingDef.label: bandages
ThingDef.description: A set of clean bandages for urgent wound dressing.

ThingDef.label: Wire
ThingDef.description: Insulated wires serving various electrical circuits.

ThingDef.label: Simple electronic
ThingDef.description: Simple components such as capacitors, relays, boards to build simple electronics.

ThingDef.label: Microelectronics
ThingDef.description: Integrated circuits for creating complex technical devices.

ThingDef.label: Simple weapon components
ThingDef.description: A set of all kinds of weapon parts with which you can assemble simple weapons.

ThingDef.label: Advanced weapon components
ThingDef.description: A set of all kinds of weapon parts with which you can assemble advanced weapons.

ThingDef.label: Hi-Tech weapon components
ThingDef.description: A set of all kinds of weapon parts with which you can assemble hi-tech weapons.

ThingDef.label: Weapon upgrade components
ThingDef.description: All kinds of spare parts for weapon tuning.

ThingDef.label: Fermentation mixture
ThingDef.description: A prepared mixture including water, sugar and primary raw materials for subsequent fermentation.

ThingDef.label: Refrigerant canister
ThingDef.description: A prepared mixture including water, sugar and primary raw materials for subsequent fermentation.

ThingDef.label: Fuel briquette
ThingDef.description: Fuel briquettes made from pressed waste and wood under high pressure. More efficient fuel than wood.
